title: Should I open all my chests before pre-season or wait and open after?
body:
I currently have somewhere around 10 keys ready to open chests.  
I'm not sure if I should use the keys now or if opening after preseason would be better

replies.body: *In my personal opinon*, I feel like opening those chests and disenchanting anything you don't *immediately* want would be the best option. When preseason hits, all of your current blue essence is getting multiplied by 6.5, so if you disenchanted those now you would end up with more essence to spend in the long run. I'd also refer to [**this guide for some tips**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908-Preseason-Update-FAQ) on the upcoming preseason changes ^_^!
you only thought about blue essence. How about the double rewards in chests and bad luck protection for skin fragments in preseason?
Ayyyyy, this is still just my personal opinion, and the blue essence greatly outweighs any double rewards or bad luck protection stuff IMHO.
